title: file monitoring
extract: File Integrity Monitoring (FIM) is an internal process that plays out the demonstration of approving the integrity of operating system and application software files using a validation technique between the present document state and a known, whitelist.Jan 1, 2018
extract_html: File Integrity Monitoring (FIM) is an internal process that plays out the demonstration of approving the integrity of operating system and application software files using a validation technique between the present document state and a known, whitelist.Jan 1, 2018
